collection.name: Luminous Bracelet
collection.openText: This bracelet shall not forgive those who hold greed in their hearts, thus it must only be worn by those in true need.

specialTipSize.specialTip: Stats regarding Fortitude will greatly increase while $0 is worn.
$0 continually recovers the wearer’s HP when it drops.
The wearer will die if any attempt to return $0 is made before they are fully healed.
If the wearer’s HP has not dropped after a certain period of time, then they will die from excessive regeneration.
